title: Arabian Beachfront Oasis with Seven Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Step into a tranquil ocean paradise with a stay at Crowne Plaza Hotels & Resorts Salalah, an IHG Hotel - a palm-tree-covered oasis on the banks of the Arabian Sea. Salalah is a colourful city home to breathtaking cultural landmarks. This sub-tropical haven is the perfect vacation for groups of friends and families wanting to spend their days lounging by the pools, soaking up some sunshine on the pristine beaches and indulging in spectacular dining at the seven onsite restaurants and bars.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Hotels & Resorts Salalah, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Po Box 870,  Al Khandaq St, Salalah 211, Oman

vendor_name: Al Baleed Resort Salalah by Anantara
title: Opulent Five-Star Oman Beachfront Oasis Overlooking Arabian Sea
description: Discover the beachfront paradise that is Al Baleed Resort Salalah by Anantara, a stunning oasis overlooking the Arabian Sea. Indulge in next-level five-star luxury: dive into the crystal-clear infinity pool spilling over the silky-white sands, lounge poolside beneath a cabana, and treat yourself to utter bliss at the Anantara Spa. Learn about the country's heritage with a trip to the ancient archaeological ruins only minutes away, and end the day with a spectacular meal at one of three onsite restaurants.
location_description: Al Baleed Resort Salalah by Anantara
offer_address: PC 214, Al Mansurah Street, Al Baleed, Salalah 360, Oman
